general.description:
Irilia-18 is a recent colony founded by Irilia-14 people, originally established as a surrogate mining settlement.
Its living conditions are not excellent, even compared to Irilia-14, with an athmosphere smelling like rotten eggs and a low level of luminosity due to the air being of a steady yellow, but the honor reward is good and the world is ore-rich. So the colony, although quite recent, is thriving.
general.bar: A gloomy ambiance with miners talking of their home planet
